ActivityLevelsLevel.1000101.2:
We've encountered another group of Trekkers hunting for treasure on this island!
Keep an eye out for stamina recovery items by the path, and let's face off under the sun!

We've encountered another group of Trekkers hunting for treasure on this island!
Keep an eye out for stamina recovery items in the area, and don't forget your sunscreen!

Keep an eye out for stamina recovery items by the path, and beware the elite enemies!

We've encountered a strong group of Trekkers hunting for treasure on this island!
Elite enemies are everywhere; proceed with caution and watch for dropped recovery items!

Prepare cautiously, for its overwhelming attacks are imminent!

United Harvest's farming machines are on a rampage! Clear them out to protect the forest.
Grab the energy supplies they drop, and watch out for the ferocious machine beasts!

This is the final battle—stay sharp and be ready for anything!
ActivityLevelsLevel.1020101.2:
In the corrupted forest, a massive monster army is closing in!
Watch out for the synergy of the monsters and stay alert for traps along the way!

ActivityLevelsLevel.1020104.2:

Watch out for the monsters coming your way and do everything you can to survive!

In the increasingly menacing forest, the army of monsters is rampaging out of control!
The number of traps is rising, so be extremely careful!

Head into the depths of the corrupted forest and face him in a duel!

Watch for traps along the path and move forward with care!

ActivityLevelsLevel.2010101.2:
A challenge from the Snowish Tree Spirit? Let's turn this place upside down!
Wipe the monsters and pick your prize!

ActivityLevelsLevel.2010104.2:
Sneak Sherlock has made off with a stash of presents!
Catch it! It's our only lead on the missing gifts.
ActivityLevelsLevel.2010105.2:
The bells have rung, and the party is heating up with much tougher dance partners!
Enjoy the fun, but stay sharp—you still need to recover those lost gifts!

ActivityLevelsLevel.2010108.2:
Magic has awakened the furniture, and now even the stove is after your loot.
Stand your ground and defend the gifts you've earned!
ActivityLevelsLevel.2010201.2:
The gifts are set, and dinner is served!
But before the party kicks off, we need to deal with some unwanted crashers!
ActivityLevelsLevel.2010202.2:
The gift cart is way off course. Something's not right...
There! It's that thief Sherlock at it again!
ActivityLevelsLevel.2010203.2:
The gifts are set, and dinner is served!
But before the party kicks off, we need to deal with some unwanted crashers!
ActivityLevelsLevel.2010204.2:
Denied a gift and twisted by magic, this thing shows no mercy!
It has morphed into a Stellaroid—taking it down is your duty!
ActivityLevelsLevel.2010301.2:
Is this fantasy or reality?! We might only know when the music stops.
For the grand finale, defeat these Stellaroids and wait for the midnight bell to reveal the truth!
ActivityLevelsLevel.2010302.2:
Is this fantasy or reality?! We might only know when the music stops.

ActivityLevelsLevel.2010303.2:
Sherlock never learns! It's back to stealing presents!
Foil its plans and reclaim the goods from that cart!
ActivityLevelsLevel.2010304.2:
The Bizarre Stove has its eyes locked on your gifts. It won't go down without a fight!
Watch out! Never underestimate a Stellaroid's obsession!
